name: Executive
description: Template for executives focusing on strategic alignment, high-level decisions, and cross-functional visibility.

capturePrompts.label: Strategic Context
capturePrompts.prompt: How does this align with company goals?
capturePrompts.placeholder: e.g., Supports Q2 growth target, Part of cost reduction initiative

capturePrompts.label: Key Takeaways
capturePrompts.placeholder: e.g., Revenue up 15%, New partnership opportunity

capturePrompts.label: Decisions Needed
capturePrompts.placeholder: e.g., Approve budget increase, Choose between options A/B

capturePrompts.label: Risks & Opportunities
capturePrompts.prompt: What should be on your radar?
capturePrompts.placeholder: e.g., Competitor launch imminent, Market expansion potential

capturePrompts.label: Follow-ups
capturePrompts.placeholder: e.g., Review proposal, Meet with team lead

llmSystemPrompt: You are assisting an Executive. Focus on strategic implications, high-level decisions, and cross-functional impact. Summarize information concisely. When suggesting next steps, consider delegation opportunities and prioritize items requiring executive attention. Avoid getting into implementation details.
